Structs/WebSocketFrame.html#/s:12NIOWebS.name: rsv1
Structs/WebSocketFrame.html#/s:12NIOWebS.abstract: The value of the first reserved bit. Must be false unless using an extension that defines its use.

Structs/WebSocketFrame.html#/s:12NIOWebS.name: rsv2

Structs/WebSocketFrame.html#/s:12NIOWebS.name: rsv3
Structs/WebSocketFrame.html#/s:12NIOWebS.abstract: The value of the third reserved bit. Must be false unless using an extension that defines its use.

Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.name: supportedProtocol
Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.abstract: RFC 6455 specs this as the required entry in the Upgrade header.

Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.name: requiredUpgradeHeaders
Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.abstract: None of the websocket headers are actually defined as ‘required’.

Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.name: randomRequestKey()
Classes/NIOWebSocketClientUpgrader.html#.abstract: Generates a random WebSocket Request Key by generating 16 bytes randomly using the SystemRandomNumberGenerator and encoding them as a base64 string as defined in RFC6455 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6455#section-4.1.
